page.title: 18FEATURES OF GRID SQUARES
page.content: 9537:principal features include:- Post office, School, the hamlets of Green Stitch and Longlane Head. The average height is 220m. 9536:principal features include:- Mosslane, a Nursery and the hamlets of Rushlade and The Leasowes. {MILLS}The Moddershall Valley had 7 mills but these have all closed in the last half of this century. At Splashy mill (Grid Ref 920367) calcined flints from the flint kiln would be pushed along in trucks, along the plate-way to a point below a trap- door in the first floor of the mill. Here they were poured into the base of the pan, made of silicon stone and the upper stone positioned by water power to grind down into a watery creamy fluid which was then piped to a settling ARK.When the major water had evaporated it was then dried in a kiln.
